summary: Diff updates the service worker to cache and refresh the existing background asset URLs (version bump + explicit background asset list), and modifies index.css/background handling per summary. However, the required Nairobi skyline image files themselves are not added (no new assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/). The diff also includes many unrelated feature changes beyond the background update.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add new generated Nairobi skyline background image assets using the exact existing filenames and dimensions, placed in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (mobile: mawalking-user-bg-mobile.dim_1080x1920.(png|webp|avif); desktop: mawalking-user-bg.dim_1920x1080.(png|webp|avif)).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff reports no added files, so the required image assets are not present in the change set.
